2164.subject: SPED
2164.course_title_long: Teaching Functional Communication to Students with Moderate to Severe Disabilities
2164.descrlong: This course is designed to prepare teachers to effectively address the communicative needs of students with mod/sev disabilities participating in a variety of ed settings. Topics covered include assessment of communication, the development of various communication systems, promoting enhanced communication skills and social networks, and issues in this field for future consideration. Required for students in the Moderate to Severe Program only. Includes online, hybrid and face to face.
